pageProduct.name: Antipodes Culture Probiotic Night Recovery Water Cream 60ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Join the cult for beautiful skin with this uniquely textured water cream moisturizer, formulated with plant-based hyaluronic acid and the power of probiotics. Infuse your skin with good bacteria that promotes healthy skin, so you awake to your freshest, healthiest looking visage. Deliver a lifeline to tired and stressed skin by helping to boost water levels thanks to plant-based hyaluronic acid and native New Zealand mamaku black fern. Formulated with 100% natural ingredients and certified vegan, Culture Probiotic Night Recovery Water Cream is suited to all skin types, especially tired, sensitive, or generally stressed skin. With pure plant fragrance of deep fresh rose, citronella, and geranium.

Warnings

Store below 21C. External application only. Patch test prior to use. In the unlikely event of negative skin reaction, discontinue use and consult a health expert. Store in a cool dark place. Colour and clarity may vary between products due to pure natural content.

Common Uses

A cloud-soft water cream moisturizer for most skin types, Culture Probiotic Night Recovery Water Cream delivers calm, clear, hydrated skin so you awaken to your freshest visage. It’s all thanks to Kalibiome AGE Probiotic, an innovative, natural frontier in anti-aging and skin regeneration. Kalibiome AGE Probiotic is a natural bacteria, made from human skin cells, that seals the skin’s epidermal layers, so reducing water loss and protecting against irritants such as pollution. Cleverly utilised in this certified vegan moisturiser, Kailibiome AGE Probiotic supports firmer skin and reduced wrinkles*. The clean, 100% natural formulation is effective and certified vegan. Water levels are boosted thanks to plant-based hyaluronic acid and native New Zealand mamaku black fern. Hyaluronic acid holds up to 1,000 times its weight in water, so is efficient at keeping the skin deeply hydrated. Mamaku black fern, an iconic New Zealand native plant, contains glycosides, or natural sugars, that help to balance and renew the skin’s surface. The divine fragrances of deep fresh rose, citronella and geranium will let your drift into a deep and rejuvenating sleep. This natural night cream is suited to all skin types, especially tired, sensitive, or generally stressed skin. For best results, use every night before retiring to bed. Formulated with probiotic good bacteria* for healthier looking skin. Certified vegan by the UK Vegetarian Society (VegSoc) – the oldest and most respected vegetarian organisation in the world. Like all Antipodes® products, Culture Probiotic Night Recovery Water Cream is 100% natural and free from toxic ingredients including parabens, sulphates, petrochemicals, and artificial fragrances. *kalibiome probiotics/postbiotics 600: clinically shown to revitalise extracellular matr

Ingredients

Aqua (water), glycerine, cetearyl olivate, sorbitan olivate, sodium acrylates copolymer & lecithin, Simmondsia chinensis (jojoba) seed oil, Limnanthes alba (meadowfoam) oil, dehydroacetic acid, benzyl alcohol, glyceryl caprylate, bisabolol, sodium hyaluronate, xanthan gum & lecithin & sclerotium gum & pullulan, Aloe barbadensis (aloe vera) leaf extract, organic, Lactobacillus ferment, mannitol, maltodextrin, sodium citrate, Cyathea medullaris (mamaku) black fern extract, Phormium tenax (harakeke) flax extract, Hibiscus sabdariffa (hibiscus) flower extract, mica, titanium dioxide, iron oxide, manganese violet, Fragrance of Deep Fresh Rose: citral†, citronellol†, geraniol†, d-Limonene†, linalool†.

Directions

Gently smooth a generous layer of this light natural moisturiser over your face and neck every night after cleansing and toning. Leave on overnight and after a deeply relaxing sleep, rinse with warm water and a gentle face cloth to reveal your freshest ever skin.
